Release Date: 1st July 2008

- It doesn't have any configure options. 

- The oai gate is in /Plone/oai. 

For more information about Open Archives Initiative visit www.openarchives.org and test it
in http://re.cs.uct.ac.za/. 

contact developers: dgg15@alu.ua.es - David Gonzalez  || Xavi Torregrosa xtj@alu.ua.es
